script.name: !move.mine.sector
script.description: Mine one specific mineral right where you are
script.sourceplaintext:
* Mine Sector V2.0 * Author: SymTec ltd. * Additional Author: Cycrow * Additional Author: Owen * Developed 21.10.07-23.10.07 for X3TC scripting team * Changelog: * V1.0: 23.10.07 Initial Release * V1.2: 16.01.08 Reworked * V1.4: 12.01.09 Rebalanced * V1.5: 23.01.09 Removed IS/OOS decision for more constant behavior * V1.6: 17.03.09 Re-implemented IS/OOS decision for technical reasons * V2.0: Converted to sector mining script
* Arguments - Default behavior: * Mine one specific mineral, right where your are, until either your cargobay is * full or you cannot find anymore minerals. * mineral: Mineral MUST be provided. * amount: Amount MAY be provided if not $a.minerals $a.minerals = create new array, arguments=Ore, Silicon Ore, Ice, null, null else if not is datatype[ $a.minerals ] == DATATYPE_ARRAY $a.minerals = create new array, arguments=$a.minerals, null, null, null, null end
skip if [THIS] -> get amount of ware Mineral Scanner in cargo bay return 'error.nomineralscanner' skip if [THIS] -> get amount of ware Ore Collector in cargo bay return 'error.noorecollector'
$a.minerals = clone array: $a.minerals $i = size of array $a.minerals while $i dec $i = $mineral = $a.minerals[$i] if not [THIS] -> can transport ware $mineral remove element from array $a.minerals at index $i else if not [THIS] -> get free amount of ware $mineral in cargo bay remove element from array $a.minerals at index $i end end
skip if size of array $a.minerals return null
skip if $a.amount > 0 $a.amount = -1
$a.breakRocks = [TRUE]
while 1 @ = wait 1000 ms
$scanner = [THIS] -> get scanner range
* OOS Debris are not destroyed so occasionaly look beyond nearest $find.flags = [Find.Nearest] if not [THIS] -> is in active sector skip if random value from 0 to 5 - 1 $find.flags = null end
gosub SubFindWeapon if not $laserstrength if $find.flags $find.flags = $find.flags | [Find.Debris] else $find.flags = [Find.Debris] end end
$debris = null
$doMinerals = clone array: $a.minerals $size = size of array $doMinerals while $size $rnd = random value from 0 to $size - 1 $mineral = $doMinerals[$rnd] remove element from array $doMinerals at index $rnd $size = size of array $doMinerals
if [THIS] -> can transport ware $mineral if [THIS] -> get free amount of ware $mineral in cargo bay $debris = find debris: sector=[SECTOR] resource=$mineral min yield=1 flags=$find.flags refobj=[THIS] num=0 max distance=null refpos=null do if $debris -> exists break end end
end
if not $debris -> exists if $a.breakRocks gosub SubKillAsteroid continue else return 'error.nomineralsfound' end end
$text = read text: page=17 id=5551 $text = sprintf: pageid=6020 textid=2077, $text, null, null, null, null [THIS] ->set command extra display override: text=$text
$x = $debris -> get x position $y = $debris -> get y position $z = $debris -> get z position @ = [THIS] -> call script !move.movetoposition : sector=[SECTOR] position x=$x position y=$y position z=$z precision=1000 gosub SubGalaxyWait
gosub SubFindWeapon
skip if $debris -> exists continue
if $debris -> has collectible rocks gosub SubCollectRocks
else if $laserstrength * Select weapon and fire at debris. gosub SubFireWeapon gosub SubGalaxyWait gosub SubCollectRocks end
* If cargobay is full: Return home $i = size of array $a.minerals $amount = 0 while $i dec $i = $mineral = $a.minerals[$i] $tmp = [THIS] -> get amount of ware $mineral in cargo bay $amount = $amount + $tmp do if $a.amount > 0 AND $amount >= $a.amount return null skip if [THIS] -> get free amount of ware $mineral in cargo bay return null end
* Repair ship if hull is low $tmp = [THIS] -> get hull percent if $tmp < 40 AND [OWNER] != Player @ = [THIS] -> call script !move.repair : Shipyard=null end
end
return null
SubKillAsteroid: $scanner = [THIS] -> get scanner range $find.flags = [Find.Nearest] | [Find.NonInvincible] $doMinerals = clone array: $a.minerals while size of array $doMinerals $size = size of array $doMinerals $rnd = random value from 0 to $size - 1 $mineral = $doMinerals[$rnd] remove element from array $doMinerals at index $rnd
if [THIS] -> can transport ware $mineral if [THIS] -> get free amount of ware $mineral in cargo bay $asteroid = find asteroid: sector=[SECTOR] resourcetype=$mineral min.yield=1 flags=$find.flags refobj=[THIS] maxdist=null maxnum=null refpos=null if $asteroid -> exists gosub SubEquipDrill gosub SubFindMissile $use.missile = $ret.Value $text = sprintf: pageid=6020 textid=2096, null, null, null, null, null if [THIS] ->is laser installed: laser=Mobile Drilling System [THIS] ->set command extra display override: text=$text gosub SubGalaxyWait gosub SubFindDrill $turret = $ret.Value $debris = $asteroid gosub SubFireWeapon endsub else if $use.missile [THIS] ->set command extra display override: text=$text @ = [THIS] -> call script !move.movetoobject : Target=$asteroid Range=8000 if not $missile.fired -> exists if [THIS] -> is in active sector $missile.fired = [THIS] -> fire missile $use.missile on $asteroid else @ = wait randomly from 2000 to 5000 ms = [THIS] -> add -1 units of $use.missile $asteroid ->destroy object: killer=[THIS], show no explosion=[FALSE] @ = wait randomly from 1000 to 2000 ms end end endsub end end end end end return 'error.nomineralsfound' endsub
SubGalaxyWait: if not [THIS] -> is in active sector @ = wait 2500 ms end endsub
SubFindMissile: $ret.Value = null $aMissiles = [THIS] -> get compatible missile array from cargobay $tMissiles = table alloc $i = size of array $aMissiles while $i dec $i = $missile = $aMissiles[$i] $damage = get missile max damage of $missile $tMissiles[$missile] = $damage end $aMissiles = sort table keys by value: table=$tMissiles $size = size of array $aMissiles $i = 0 while $i < $size $missile = $aMissiles[$i] $damage = get missile max damage of $missile $min.damage = get missile max damage of Hornet Missile if $damage >= $min.damage $ret.Value = $missile break end inc $i = end endsub
SubFindDrill: $turrets = [THIS] -> get number of turrets $turret = 0 while $turret < $turrets $j = [THIS] -> get max. number of lasers in turret $turret while $j dec $j = $laser = [THIS] -> get laser type in turret $turret at slot $j if $laser == Mobile Drilling System $ret.Value = $turret endsub end end inc $turret = end endsub
SubEquipDrill: if [THIS] -> get amount of ware Mobile Drilling System in cargo bay if not [THIS] ->is laser installed: laser=Mobile Drilling System $best.turret = -1 $best.turret.id = -1 $i = [THIS] -> get number of turrets $shiptype = [THIS] -> get ware type code of object
while $i dec $i = if [THIS] -> fits laser Mobile Drilling System into turret $i if $i == 0 $best.turret = $i break else if $best.turret == -1 $best.turret = $i $best.turret.id = get turret text id: shiptype=$shiptype turret=$i else $turret.id = get turret text id: shiptype=$shiptype turret=$i if $turret.id == 1 $best.turret = $i $best.turret.id = $turret.id else if ( $turret.id == 3 OR $turret.id == 4 ) AND $best.turret.id != 1 $best.turret = $i $best.turret.id = $turret.id else if ( $turret.id == 5 OR $turret.id == 6 ) AND $best.turret.id != 1 AND $best.turret.id != 3 AND $best.turret.id != 4 $best.turret = $i $best.turret.id = $turret.id end end end end if $best.turret != -1 = [THIS] ->install laser, turret=$best.turret, slot=0, laser=Mobile Drilling System end end end
endsub
* Find the best weapon installed SubFindWeapon: $laserstrength = 0 * Loop through turrets $i = [THIS] -> get number of turrets while $i dec $i =
$laserstrength.current = [THIS] -> get max laser strength in turret $i * Find strongest laser if $laserstrength.current > $laserstrength $x = [THIS] -> get max. number of lasers in turret $i * Loop through lasers in turret while $x dec $x = $tmp = [THIS] -> get laser type in turret $i at slot $x * ToDo: Check if more weapons do not work. if $tmp if not get ammunition of laser $tmp $y = get hull damage of laser $tmp if $y $laserstrength = $laserstrength.current $turret = $i end end end end end end endsub
* Fire this weapon at the debris SubFireWeapon: $is.debris = $debris -> is of class Debris $is.active = [THIS] -> is in active sector if $is.debris $text = sprintf: pageid=6020 textid=2097, null, null, null, null, null [THIS] ->set command extra display override: text=$text end
@ = [THIS] -> call script !move.idle.timeout : timeout in sec=3 wait while docked=null
skip if $is.active @ = [THIS] -> call script !move.idle.timeout : timeout in sec=5 wait while docked=null
$i = 101 * Loop: Continuously fire at debris until debris is destroyed while $debris -> exists dec $i =
skip if $is.active @ = [THIS] -> call script !move.movetoobject : Target=$asteroid Range=500
* Refine position every 20th shot if not $i mod 20 $retvar = [THIS] -> move to debris/asteroid $debris and turn turret $turret to target: timeout=500 skip if $is.active @ = wait randomly from 200 to 500 ms end
skip if $debris -> exists break if $is.debris do if $debris -> has collectible rocks break end
if $retvar == FLRET_FIREFREE if ! $is.active AND ! $is.debris @ = wait randomly from 1000 to 2000 ms $debris ->destroy object: killer=[THIS], show no explosion=[FALSE] @ = wait randomly from 2000 to 4000 ms do if $debris -> exists $debris ->destruct: show no explosion=[FALSE] else = [THIS] -> fire lasers on target $debris using turret $turret @ = wait randomly from 400 to 600 ms end end
skip if $debris -> exists break if $debris -> is of class Debris do if $debris -> has collectible rocks break end
* Move on after 100 shots do if $i <= 0 break end
skip if $is.active @ = [THIS] -> call script !move.idle.timeout : timeout in sec=5 wait while docked=null
endsub
SubCollectRocks: if $debris -> exists $mineral = $debris -> get resource waretype of asteroid $text = sprintf: pageid=6020 textid=2098, $mineral, null, null, null, null [THIS] ->set command extra display override: text=$text
@ = [THIS] -> call script !move.collectrocks : GALOBJ of debris=$debris
* Once in a while, collide with a rock - IS does this as well... hehe if not [THIS] -> is in active sector if [OWNER] == Player if not random value from 0 to 100 - 1 $x = random value from 1 to 44 - 1 * Calc for decreasing curve - min is most probable, max is 79507 (75MJ+hull) $x = $x * $x * $x $y = [THIS] -> get current shield strength $y = $y - $x if $y >= 0 [THIS] ->set current shield strength to $y else [THIS] ->set current shield strength to 0 $z = [THIS] -> get hull $z = $z + $y if $z > 0 [THIS] ->set hull to $z else $tmp = find debris: sector=[SECTOR] resource=null min yield=null flags=null refobj=null num=null max distance=null refpos=null skip if $tmp -> exists $tmp = find asteroid: sector=[SECTOR] resourcetype=null min.yield=null flags=null refobj=null maxdist=null maxnum=null refpos=null skip if $tmp -> exists [THIS] ->destroy object: killer=$tmp, show no explosion=[TRUE] return null end * End of: If shield is 0 end * End of: If collision with rock end * End of: If player owned end * End of: While debris still has yield *end * End of: If Player is OOS end * End of: If debris exists end endsub return null

comment.var: V1.5: 23.01.09 Removed IS/OOS decision for more constant behavior
V1.6: 17.03.09 Re-implemented IS/OOS decision for technical reasons
V2.0: Converted to sector mining script

full or you cannot find anymore minerals.
OOS Debris are not destroyed so occasionaly look beyond nearest

get max. number of lasers in turret
get ware type code of object
get max laser strength in turret
get max. number of lasers in turret

Fire this weapon at the debris

sval.val: Mine one specific mineral right where you are
V1.5: 23.01.09 Removed IS/OOS decision for more constant behavior
V1.6: 17.03.09 Re-implemented IS/OOS decision for technical reasons
V2.0: Converted to sector mining script
Mine one specific mineral, right where your are, until either your cargobay is
full or you cannot find anymore minerals.
OOS Debris are not destroyed so occasionaly look beyond nearest
Select weapon and fire at debris.
If cargobay is full: Return home
Repair ship if hull is low
ToDo: Check if more weapons do not work.
Fire this weapon at the debris
Loop: Continuously fire at debris until debris is destroyed
Once in a while, collide with a rock - IS does this as well... hehe
Calc for decreasing curve - min is most probable, max is 79507 (75MJ+hull)
End of: If collision with rock
End of: While debris still has yield
End of: If Player is OOS
